text: Vijaya Lakshmi Pandit (18 August 1900 â€“ 1 December 1990) was an freedom fighter, diplomat and politician. She also served as the 8th President of the United Nations General Assembly from 1953 to 1954. Pandit was also appointed as the 3rd Governor of Maharashtra from 1962 to 1964. == References == Category:1900 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Ambassadors of India to the United States Category:Governors of Maharashtra Category:Politicians from Lucknow Category:Presidents of the United Nations General Assembly
title: Vijaya Lakshmi Pandit
